purpose: Explore AI-driven cognitive drift and its applications in creative and exploratory tasks
principle: Utilizes AI algorithms to simulate cognitive drift, generating novel ideas and associations
reusability: Designed as a modular TypeScript library with configurable parameters for drift simulation
limitations: Experimental nature with unpredictable outcomes, requires tuning for specific use cases
name: ai-agent-cognitivedriftt
highlight: Simulates cognitive drift to inspire creativity and novel idea generation
